# Assessment Prioritization for West Coast Groundfish

## Overview

This repository houses information and data processing for the creation
of assessment prioritizaiton used by the Pacific Fishery Management
Council to inform the selection of stocks for assessment each cycle.
Prioritization incorporates multiple quantitative and qualitative
factors. The final results can be found
[online](https://connect.fisheries.noaa.gov/pfmc-groundfish-assessment-prioritization/).

## Disclaimer

*These materials do not constitute a formal publication and are for
information only. They are in a pre-review, pre-decisional state and
should not be formally cited (or reproduced). They are to be considered
provisional and do not represent any determination or policy of NOAA or
the Department of Commerce.*

# Package index

## All functions

- [`all_species()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/all_species.md)
  : Common species name in a matrix form. This approach can result in
  issues in identifying species. Needs to be improved in order to create
  search groups for complex species.
- [`calculate_rank()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/calculate_rank.md)
  : Calculate the assessment prioritization rank by species based upon
  all the factors.
- [`calculate_ties()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/calculate_ties.md)
  : Calculate tiess within ranks.
- [`clean_model_files()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/clean_model_files.md)
  : Function to delete extraneous Stock Synthesis files. This function
  only deletes extra Stock Synthesis files to reduce the number of files
  for each assessment. Not necessary to run to read or summarize model
  results.
- [`create_calender()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/create_calender.md)
  : Create a calender
- [`filter_gemm()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/filter_gemm.md)
  : Filter the GEMM data for select sectors
- [`filter_revenue()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/filter_revenue.md)
  : Filter out and identify tribal and non-tribal records
- [`filter_years()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/filter_years.md)
  : Filter data by year
- [`format_all()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/format_all.md)
  : Do all final formatting
- [`format_species_names()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/format_species_names.md)
  : Standardize species names
- [`format_table()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/format_table.md)
  : Combine management group to tables based on species names
- [`get_species_codes()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/get_species_codes.md)
  : Return PacFIN species codes
- [`move_files_to_sap()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/move_files_to_sap.md)
  : Copy and move csv file by factor to the shiny repo
- [`summarize_const_demand()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/summarize_const_demand.md)
  : Calculations used for the "Const Demand" tab for assessment
  prioritization.
- [`summarize_ecosystem()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/summarize_ecosystem.md)
  : Calculate ecosystem rank based upon Atlantis/Ecosim output
- [`summarize_fishing_mortality()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/summarize_fishing_mortality.md)
  : Comparison between recent average mortality, OFLs, and ACLs.
- [`summarize_frequency()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/summarize_frequency.md)
  : Function to create the full assessment frequency tab.
- [`summarize_future_spex()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/summarize_future_spex.md)
  : Function to compare future ACLs to existing fishing mortality
  averages.
- [`summarize_new_information()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/summarize_new_information.md)
  : Calculate score based upon new information and research
- [`summarize_rebuilding()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/summarize_rebuilding.md)
  : Calculate score based upon rebuilding
- [`summarize_rec_importance()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/summarize_rec_importance.md)
  : Calculate recreational importance
- [`summarize_revenue()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/summarize_revenue.md)
  : Calculate importance by revenue
- [`summarize_stock_status()`](https://chantelwetzel-noaa.github.io/wcsap/reference/summarize_stock_status.md)
  : Calculate ranking by stock status
